narrative.title: 7Th Armoured Division - 1943Q1
narrative.situation: British Armoured Division deployed in North Africa during 1943Q1.
narrative.objectives: Elite mobile armoured division. Primary role: breakthrough operations, exploitation, pursuit, and reconnaissance in force. 'Desert Rats' reputation established through continuous combat 1940-1943 in North Africa.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Mixed terrain - coastal plain, hills, wadis, and rocky plateau (Southern Tunisia)

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Experienced in fighting German Afrika Korps

environment.terrain_type: Mixed terrain - coastal plain, hills, wadis, and rocky plateau (Southern Tunisia)
